meta.title: Smart Ride-Sharing App | Book Seats Instantly
meta.description: Revolutionary ride-sharing platform with real-time seat booking. Drivers earn more, passengers ride smarter. Join via barcode, car plate, or chair code.
meta.keywords: ride-sharing app, smart ride system, driver dashboard, passenger app, barcode ride booking, car plate booking, digital ride-sharing platform

hero.title: Start Your Smart Ride Today
hero.description: The future of ride-sharing is here. Drivers create routes, passengers book seats instantly. Real-time updates, multiple booking options, seamless payments.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, smart, and seamless for both drivers and passengers

step1.title: Register Your Route
step1.description: Create a ride based on your regular route. Set departure time, destination, and available seats.

step2.title: View Live Bookings
step2.description: Watch your car layout in real-time. Booked seats turn green instantly with passenger details.

step3.title: Get Instant Notifications
step3.description: Receive alerts like "Seat 5 booked by Ahmed" with payment confirmation automatically.

step1.title: Scan Seat Barcode
step1.description: Simply scan the barcode on your seat to instantly join the ride. Quick and contactless.

step2.title: Enter Chair Code
step2.description: Barcode damaged? No problem. Enter the 14-digit chair code manually to book your seat.

step3.title: Use License Plate
step3.description: Enter the car's license plate number to find and join the active ride. Multiple ways to connect!

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a seamless ride-sharing experience

realTime.title: Real-Time Seat Visualization
realTime.description: Watch your car fill up in real-time. Each booking turns the corresponding seat green on your dashboard, with instant passenger notifications and complete transparency.

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Never miss a booking. Get real-time alerts when passengers book seats, complete payments, or cancel rides. Stay informed every step of the way.

multipleBooking.title: Multiple Booking Methods
multipleBooking.description: Passengers can join rides by scanning barcodes, entering 14-digit chair codes, or using license plate numbers. Flexibility meets convenience.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Automatic payment processing with multiple payment methods. Drivers get paid instantly when passengers book, with full transaction history.

convenience.title: Maximum Convenience
convenience.description: Book rides in seconds using barcodes, codes, or license plates. No complicated forms or lengthy processes.

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: See exactly who booked which seat, when, and payment status. No hidden surprises, just clear information.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: Built with the latest tech stack for lightning-fast performance, real-time updates, and seamless user experience.

earnMore.title: Earn More, Save More
earnMore.description: Drivers maximize earnings on regular routes. Passengers save money compared to traditional taxis and ride services.
